title: TypeTrust presents "Facebuster" by Silas Dilworth
content:
Facebuster is my latest plaything. It's a super slab / block serif display face.

It'll be on sale 20% off until the end of September exclusively at TypeTrust.com.

View and buy it [here: http://typetrust.com/font/facebuster](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019042607/http:/typetrust.com/font/facebuster)

And the [PDF is here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019042607/http:/typetrust.com/fonts/specimen_pdfs/TypeTrust-Facebuster.pdf).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019042607im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Facebuster-Typophile_6565.gif)
author: silas

comments.content: Love it. Must find an excuse to buy it and set an entire page in all caps... :)
Reminds me of a typeface from Stefan Kjartansson.

<cite>Reminds me of a typeface from Stefan Kjartansson.</cite>

Yeah? Which one? I could not find anything similar… Please add a link.

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO

I believe John is referring to [Black Slabbath](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019042607/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=t0133).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019042607im_/http:/typophile.com/files/T0133_07_4841.jpg)
Maybe the same bulking up program but clearly different DNA.

Nice one SIlas! Loved this one as well as Breuer!  
Cheers  
Fred
